verbs.description: [ARG1: pineapple] - [V: stuffed] [ARG1: cornish hens] my mother brought this recipe back with her from hawaii about 25 years ago the tender meat pineapple - coconut stuffing and sweet - sour sauce made it a favorite of my family and friends i keep copies of the recipe on hand to share —vicki corners rock island illinois
